thread.title: Introducing a Kickstarter Campaign for The World's Best Laptop Stand
thread.title_full: Introducing a Kickstarter Campaign for The World's Best Laptop Stand

author: prbuzz.com
title: Introducing a Kickstarter Campaign for The World's Best Laptop Stand
text:
For Immediate Release
A SEXY PORTABLE LAPTOP AND SMARTPHONE STAND
Anybody who's made a run to Office Depot lately knows that there are aisles full of portable laptop stands. And as far as we've seen, they're all hideous. We took one look at the Apex Stand and knew these cats were onto something. Note the smartphone holder.
THE APEX REVOLUTION
Even if the idea is revolutionary, it can't happen without your help. Join us in our goal to fund The Apex Stand and help take our current prototype into full production. With your help, we can release the Apex Stand to market in the late fall of this year. Be apart of our campaign and help us make this vision happen!
To support this campaign, please visit this link http://bit.ly/Sano1
Picture 1: https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/004/297/156/33dbd9a6649731da5e0b96c6a9e1a1c5_original.gif?v=1439288735&w=680&fit=max&q=92&s=015dd54619b22d4815dfa54d2764c83d
Picture 2: https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/004/303/345/160e2c083a021d7d781ea2e1559b68da_original.jpg?v=1439368636&w=680&fit=max&auto=format&q=92&s=ab4f2552b4d2c5ffa7f4061fa2af4bb0
